The filters allow for selecting certain aspects to include or exclude from the data. Here you can add the title text to include/exclude.
The results can be sorted by clicking on the title of the filter. This funtionality is available for filters that allow such usage.
The results are displayed here, where it allows for expanding to view details and selecting specific results to add to the selection
